channel.title: How do u start making a client?
channel.description:
i am not sure how to start making my own client ... ive usually just used other ppls clients and upgraded em ... but i want to make my own custom client for my server that i can use only for my friends servers and my own ... do u have anything that could help me?
by the way ... if u wanna see the clients i have go to http://nnescape.smfforfree.com and look for the clients i have ... u can use them and change the stuff on it if u would like! :D ;D
below is the background we use for some of the clients!

item.title: How do u start making a client?
